amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 118-298 to add international organizations to the definition of foreign sources for the purposes of Section 117, Disclosures of Foreign Gifts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
